caption: This is a hip-hop music piece. There is a crisp synth sound playing the melody. The piece has a strong bass sound. There is a melodic pad with beat repeat effect that uses a piano sample. It could be used in the soundtrack of a sci-fi movie where there is a lot of action going on.
